video_prompt: Sunrise hues intensify across stretching desert formations. Vehicle headlights flicker, revealing two figures as they turn, their backpacks shifting. Shadows lengthen over the uneven terrain, dust subtly rising as a breezed stirs dry vegetation.
image_prompt: Highly detailed vertical shot, desert landscape at golden hour (sunrise/sunset), warm light. Towering, layered rock formations flanking sides, creating a canyon, strong horizontal striations, dramatic highlights and shadows. Rugged, dark SUV parked on dirt track (midground, center-left), equipped for off-road, roof rack, snorkel, grill guard, stylized "U" or "G" symbol on grille. Two hikers (backs to viewer) to the right of SUV, facing landscape, wearing outdoor attire and backpacks (blue jacket/green backpack, lighter jacket/orange-grey backpack). Ground: loose dirt, small stones, sparse dry vegetation. Large, prominent rock (out of focus, foreground, bottom center). Theme: adventure, exploration, awe-inspiring nature.
refined_video_prompt: Sunrise hues deepen and spread. Headlights flicker, illuminating two turning figures whose backpacks shift. Shadows lengthen and creep. Dust billows gently as a breeze rustles dry vegetation.
